name: Dy22w05
description:
Fifth week of my weekly game dev challenge is MoshPit1.1: my solo dev Global Game Jam 2022 game with 1 hour extra given during the week. You can check the original in here, while the new version is just better: https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/moshpit-3

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • Space - jump
  • R - restart
  • Esc - quit game

Updates after GGJ22:

  • Fixed the common clipping to the ground in respawning
  • Ragdolls are not quite as flimsy as before
  • Timer added
  • Song has a kind of an intro now
  • Gameplay duration increased from average 5s to average 50s with these edits.
